info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 11:54PM MDT until July 04 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Day County in northeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Brown County in northeastern South Dakota... Northwestern Clark County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Spink County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1254 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Groton to near Camrose Colony, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Andover around 105 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Raymond, Bristol, Butler, Clark and Webster. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
